meta.name: colors
meta.narrative: colors was a popular terminal string styling library maintained solely by Marak Squires. In January 2022, Marak deliberately sabotaged the package by publishing an infinite loop in v1.4.1/v1.4.2, protesting lack of compensation for open source work. The warning signs were clear: single maintainer, no releases in over 2 years, no PR activity, despite 20M+ weekly downloads. A textbook bus-factor-of-1 risk.

expected.notes: Classic bus factor risk. Zero recent activity despite massive downloads. The scoring system should flag the single maintainer and complete lack of recent commits. High user-centric score masks the maintenance gap.
